website_summaries.verdict: Design in this towel ring has a cool look that's quite a bit different from other models.
pros: Available in three different finishes, including brushed nickel, chrome, and oil rubbed bronze
Uses a square design for the hook that will hold your towel securely
Sturdy enough to accommodate more than one hand towel
cons: Square shape won't appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This came in a cheap, plain moen box and did not appear to be the same Moen quality I expect. We have used Moen products many years and this was not up to par. The joint where the hook of the towel ring meets the bracket part wasn’t well lined up and wasn’t flush. For the price, I expect it to be flawless. Will go back to buying this type product from a big box store. We also bought the toilet paper holder and 18” towel bar from the same line, and they also were ill-put together.
customer_reviews.author: bvmiller

customer_reviews.title: Handle with care
customer_reviews.text: There is not much one can say about a towel hook. It does what it is supposed to do. I only bought this item because I have other products in the Moen Voss line and I wanted a consistent look. Because the hook portion is just hanging out there, it does feel a little flimsy. As long it is not abused, I am sure it will serve for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: GaryBF

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of hardware. Allows for minor adjustments when installing.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Classy piece of hardware. I really think Moen makes some of the best hardware. Nicely hidden screws and the mounting allows for minor adjustments so you don't have to be exactly on when you drill your mounting holes. They have a whole matching set which is nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It's not exactly what I expected but it's okay, I guess. I have other towel rings in other houses, and they all move -- swing back and forth as you use the towel or remove it from the rack. These do not move, and it takes getting used to. Looks nice and I mostly like because I bought matching towel racks and toilet paper holders, robe hooks, and a a hair dryer holder for a couple of bathrooms in my newest house and it looks nice. I just am not in love with these towel rings.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Other products have better mounting system
customer_reviews.text: This item mounts using the old fashioned set screw, which usually fails to hold after a period of time (which is why I was replacing mine) and must be periodically retightened with a special allen wrench that you also need to keep track of. Other major companies, like Delta and Pfister have abandoned this type of mount for this reason. Why buy an item that has the same design flaw as the one I'm replacing?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It matches all our other Voss but
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't swivel. A hand towel holder really should be more flexible than this. I see why it's this way because it save company money to use the same base bracket as the other towel holders. This money saving approach which reduces the use capability is why im scoring this lower. Quality and finish are solid.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: Great for hanging fish.
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes, this fish hanging hook is amazing! I use this to hang fish I caught while deep sea fishing so I can remove scales, gut and sometimes fillet them. I simply hang them by the gills on the hook and go to work on them. This is great for fish that are of a larger size, smaller fish might need to be zip tied to the thick hook. Not sure why this is listed in the bathroom accessories section instead of sporting goods.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Kafy

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The pictures made it look like this product has a nice smooth finish, but it looks weathered and beat up. I work for a home builder and we use this product in several homes, and when we buy direct from the supplier, this product has a smooth finish. So I assumed that’s what I was buying since it was the same towel ring. However, this item plus the matching towel bar arrived looking all scratched up. Definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not reversible
customer_reviews.text: I though these were reversible as in I’d be able to flip the arm. It’s not. The arm is not solid all the way through. It has a channel running through the back, so you can’t flip it. Because of that, I can’t do a mirror image between our double sink vanity setup. Other than that, it looks great and it’s sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: dantran99

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I bought three of these for a bathroom remodel. I was surprised that Moen would put their name on something so cheaply made. Backs are hollowed out. Just looks like something you’d buy for $10. I put one up and decided against mounting the other two. I’ll be returning these. I bought a similar style in oil rubbed bronze from Delta for another bathroom- MUCH nicer but more expensive. I’ll likely buy those in Chrome for this project as well.
customer_reviews.author: Albuquerque Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Searched all local shops and could not find Oil Rubbed Bronze that did not look cheap. The Square edging vs the normal round looks more modern. Great Product. Bought 4.
customer_reviews.author: VartLiv

customer_reviews.title: and would have liked them to face in the opposite directions
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered to match my Moen sink fixtures in our newly renovated bathroom. As expected it matches perfectly to all the other fixtures, but buyers should be aware that there is no way to reverse the towel ring so it opens on the right and not the left. We have two side by side, and would have liked them to face in the opposite directions.
customer_reviews.author: Too Old To Die Young

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: All the pieces in this set are very solid and nice looking. My only "complaint" is that the ring portion doesn't move a little.
customer_reviews.author: Jody D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with my newly remodeled bathroom done with the brushed nickel finish throughout. Husband had in mounted in no time. Sturdy and is a nice distance from wall to hang your hand towel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Assest to New Bathroom
customer_reviews.text: The entire Voss line is gorgeous. Looks lovely in the bathroom. Only thing about the faucet and shower that it shows water stains. Otherwise nice looking products!
customer_reviews.author: Dulcist

customer_reviews.title: Finished my set
customer_reviews.text: I have the towel bar, toilet bar and robe hook. Got this to finish the set. Really like the look and construction.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sleek design! Easy to install. The only thing they could improve on is making the back of the hook solid. But it really doesn't matter too much since u can't see it
customer_reviews.author: sierra vera

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and well made
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted for our small newly remodeled bathroom. The brushed nicke is great looking and the size of the ring is perfect. I bought two to hang side by side. I looked long and hard for just the right hand towel rings and these are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ocean-chick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and solid. I have these in my master bath, but returned these due stictly to cost. I found other equally beautiful and of quality for half the price- basically a 2 for 1.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Oil-Rubbed Bronze Fixture!
customer_reviews.text: I knew what I wanted and I shopped around on the internet. Amazon had the best price. These Moen fixtures are just beautiful and rich. All the fixtures in our bathroom are oil-rubbed bronze and these really make everything look even better. They were also easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel Girl

customer_reviews.title: looks nice and is sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount, looks nice and is sturdy. I would beware if you have small children, it does look tempting to hang on which would bend it or bust it out of the wall. :)
customer_reviews.author: N. AMIRI

customer_reviews.title: modern, sleep design
customer_reviews.text: I love this towel rack. The product arrived well packaged, looked just like the photo on amazon, and was easy to install. I especially like the modern look. Am a huge fan of moen designs and searched everywhere- amazon was one of the few places that has the Voss collection. I had ordered other brands of bathroom fixtures, but the moen quality is definitely superior to the other similarly priced brands.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrSubscriberAday

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: A really like the way this looks, it's sturdy but elegant. The open side makes it easy to slide the hand towel off and on, but does not ever fall off. I was surprised that it did not swing, but really like it now that I'm use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Diedrich

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because it matched the ones that the builder put in. It works fine, but the "bale" doesn't move, so it's a little bit hard to put the towel on.
customer_reviews.author: Woodrick81

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend if remodeling a bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend if remodeling a bathroom. The whole Moen Voss bathroom accessory line is great. Heavy duty and looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: K O

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Classy
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found this well-made, beautiful towel ring for our powder room after months of searching. It arrived quickly and my husband installed it within minutes. It suites a practical need, but also makes a decorative, classy statement. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it would have been nice if there was a choice of a right and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and goes with my other Voss fixtures. However, it would have been nice if there was a choice of a right and left hand direction of the ring. On my large vanity, the left hand one faces out and the right hand one it faces in.
customer_reviews.author: TVAShoppers

customer_reviews.title: Finish not true to pictures
customer_reviews.text: As others pointed out, unless you are looking for this “distressed” finish, you will not like it. Pictures are not accurate to what it actually looks likes like. Loved the shape, but finish was not great. Returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: flexplex

customer_reviews.title: Great Fixtures from Moen
customer_reviews.text: The Voss fixtures from Moen look amazing in our new bathroom! They are well-built and I love the clean, modern design in chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: It is now screwed into my wall and looks terrible sticking out
customer_reviews.text: This high quality towel ring sticks out way too far from the wall. The hand towel looks absurd with it sitting out an extra 1.5 inches away from the wall. The mounting triangular structure matches the faucets but should definitely have been made smaller for a towel ring. It is now screwed into my wall and looks terrible sticking out! I also ordered a 24 inch towel bar and that looks OK because it is mounted along a wall above toilet not next to the side of the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy F. Undem

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and ease to install
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and ease to install. It took only a few minutes to install for a novice like me. Much easier than the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Christie L.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and keeps a towel handy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to our bathroom. It looks great and keeps a towel handy and off the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polishes up so nicely bought for house #1 and house #2!
customer_reviews.text: Something about the Voss keeps me coming back! Did my entire master bath with Moen Voss hardware accessories and faucets, shower head, etc. Sadly moved but purchased the towel ring for a new powder room in the new house. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: TMM

customer_reviews.title: Looks good; works great
customer_reviews.text: The open J design allows easy removal and replacement of a hand towel
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish well made
customer_reviews.text: returned because it wasn't wide enough to hold hand towel. Nice finish well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: The open ring makes it easier to hang and remove.
customer_reviews.text: Style is modern and it’s a strong, stable hand towel holder.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, easy install with sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: Quick install, great design - the towel stays on the hook! It is stationary so if you're used to the rings that move around it takes a bit to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Moen towel ring.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy! Just what I needed to complement my bathroom it' stylish and durable. I will reccommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Love the shape!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shape, after having round rings for so long this was a pleasant change. Has a beautiful finish. Easy to put towels on too.
customer_reviews.author: friscojan

customer_reviews.title: Once attached, it matched.
customer_reviews.text: A bit more difficult to attach to the bathroom wall than I expected. However, it matches the other devices I have so it was an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B. Creek

customer_reviews.title: We are so happy with the towel rings
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with the towel rings. They don't swing!! They are static which is perfect for our needs. The width of the bar is perfect for a hand towel. Moen has done a god job with their product. The installation on all our bathroom fixtures was quick and the instructions were helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It looked like a toilet paper holder when I saw it in real life. It didn't look like on in all the pictures, but I think it was the size. I liked the other pieces in this set, but I had to send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern brushed nickel towel holder
customer_reviews.text: Nice modern bathroom towel holder in brushed nickel matches nicely with other brushed nickel fixtures of different brands. Contractor mounted and had it up in 7 minutes. Sturdy and looks nice. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Love this Voss line - all high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality; nice, heavy weight. I like the installation hardware - much better than the cheaper bathroom accessories you typically find in big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: Not oil rubbed bronze
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the oil-rubbed bronze towel rings. They are nice and put together well, but they are NOT oil-rubbed bronze. They are speckled bronze. So I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Rader

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved Moen's products - especially their more modern accessories
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Moen's products - especially their more modern accessories. This towel ring looks perfect in our modern bathroom remodel and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: SE

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: We placed this on the wall just outside our new shower. Very handy to hang a towel. Not the Towel Rings fault, but where we have it installed the glass doors sometimes are interfered with by the towel. The wall is only about 8 inches wide that it is mounted. But again not the Towel Rings Fault.
customer_reviews.author: H. R. EPSTEIN

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and matches the rest of my Moen fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goodnight

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure what softness is but this metal object is an attractive piece.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly matched all the hardware and Kohler faucets for sink, tub and shower!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bae

customer_reviews.title: Simply Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality, solid and heavy, great mounting system, excellent anchors included. Expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Wall

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and substantial looking
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and substantial looking. A little narrower than I pictured in my mind, primarily due to the size of the metal in the ring. They are gorgeous on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and the towel doesn't fall off. I like that it matches my faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Macclary

customer_reviews.title: Modern clean look
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and easy to access and return hand towels with the open design. Easy to install and solid look and feel.
customer_reviews.author: kevind

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All of the moen voss products we received were great quality and look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Looks great after mounting. Easy to install, Just make sure that the orientation of the opening is suitable for your location, It is not reversible.
customer_reviews.author: Backfire

customer_reviews.title: After five months the finish is bubbling off.
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful. But after only five short months the finish is bubbling off.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, but it doesn't pivot
customer_reviews.text: It's nice and it matches the Moen Voss set, but it doesn't pivot.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncitizen

customer_reviews.title: The look is nice but the quality is not there like other Voss ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Towel Ring to match other bathroom fixtures. The back side is hollowed out (think 3 sides instead of four). The look is nice but the quality is not there like other Voss fixtures. There is only one screw that holds the ring on the wall bracket and it keeps loosening up. You have to keep tightening it up at least once a week. (only my husband and myself using it). We will use it but wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: Not like ones bought for our other bath.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good, but we are using these on a short wall near shower and we have thick 70" long towels, they do not fit well in loop like our last set that was open ended. Not bad quality using for hand towel near sink also but not good for bath towels.
customer_reviews.author: Beachie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Perfectly easy to install and matches the other Moen products I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Call

customer_reviews.title: Made in Taiwan
customer_reviews.text: Made in Taiwan, not USA as claimed in product description.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality item, solid build. The hook ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality item, solid build. The hook is not swivel mounted and does not move at all - just an FYI if you were expecting it to move. Goes well with the Moen YB2894ORB towel rack if you wanted to get it also.
customer_reviews.author: CD066

customer_reviews.title: Nice but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice solid towel rack. Nicely painted as well giving it a good look. Pricey though for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: ehhh, it's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The finish is a lot rougher than it looks in the picture, otherwise it seems solid. Overall it will work fine, I wish the finish was a less distressed look.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bunch of pieces from the Moen Voss collection and I'm really happy with all of them. They feel heavy duty and look sleek and contemporary like I imagined. No problems installing either. I love how the towel goes on Eisner than those with a full ring.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and nice clean look.
customer_reviews.text: Love the towel ring. Bought two for both bathrooms in my house. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: kpin

customer_reviews.title: Classy towel bar
customer_reviews.text: These towel holders are a complement to my remodeled bathroom...very sleek and classic
customer_reviews.author: kristine grover

customer_reviews.title: One has to be care that you don't snag a ...
customer_reviews.text: One has to be care that you don't snag a hand towel on it and wrench it from the wall. The aperture between the hook and the hold is a little small
customer_reviews.author: Mr Sir to you

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and great quality
customer_reviews.text: We really like the moen products. This was was definitely easier to put on vs some of the others. only complaint is that it is stationary, so the arm doesn't move at all. But great sturdy quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wixo

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking & highly functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this towel holder. It's easy to get the hand towel in & out, is very stable once attached to the wall & very nice to look at. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The towel ring is just what I wanted! It looks great and works well. Very pleased :-)
customer_reviews.author: BusterbrownF

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Hardware
customer_reviews.text: These towel rings look beautiful in my new backroom. Quality is very nice. They were easy to install. Look very high quality. Packaged well and arrived in perfect condition. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Stable towel holder
customer_reviews.text: I like how this ring is stationary and doesn't bang back and forth as some rings do. I bought this along with Voss Faucet and TP holder and love them all.
customer_reviews.author: catwoman322

customer_reviews.title: Good towel rings
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to match towel bars in our apartment. Would never have been our selection but they meet our needs and are well made
customer_reviews.author: Gerald P Herman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy install
customer_reviews.text: I love the all metal construction in the fixture and mounting bracket. The provided stencil make install super easy and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for hand towels
customer_reviews.text: Just like its cousin, the Moen YB5103CH Voss Double Robe Hook, it looks exactly like the photo and every single one of my hand towels thinks it rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty design but not as substansial as some of the other Voss accessories I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, high quality fixtures. I love that I could get the whole matching set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: This unique piece made my new bathroom a work of art. It is so much better than a towel ring.
customer_reviews.author: Davka

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality from Moen. My only disappointment is that it is not reversible, meaning being able to install the open side in either direction.
customer_reviews.author: IndyRon

customer_reviews.title: Loose screw
customer_reviews.text: Every week I have to tighten the screw Because I have time W/ 3 kids!
customer_reviews.author: N C

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: The towel holder from Moen looks great. Like everything else they make. Its made of great quality and looks so rich. A far cry from what they sell in big box stores
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Carcich

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the towel ring, matches all the facets and hardware throughout our new house.
customer_reviews.author: Joni H.

customer_reviews.title: Great oiled bronze look for updating your bath
customer_reviews.text: Great updated look for the bath. Does not have a hinged ring, it is a solid piece.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy quality. I would recommend to anyone thinking of buying this collection.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Matches perfect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a Voss faucet for a bathroom remodel. This towel ring matches perfectly. The only issue I have was the amount of time it took to ship.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good with the matching faucets
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good with the matching faucets. Downside to me is that they don't have a reversed one as I use one on each side of the 2-sink bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nodewalker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our small space
customer_reviews.text: Identical to another that we have. Perfect for our small space.
customer_reviews.author: Mormor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and look great with the other Voss fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: NovaEE04

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but be aware, it's smaller than most I've seen. The ring is closer to 5x5" than the 7x7" I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: KatieLou

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not sure if I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and works well. However, it looks a bit large for some hand towels. But since i got the set, it all matches and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Sturdy towel rack. love the design. I would highly recommend this product to other people. :)
customer_reviews.author: The Crow Flies Straight

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the finishing touch it gave my new bathroom
customer_reviews.text: incredibly well done! LOVE the finishing touch it gave my new bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Moen Voss Brushed Nickel towel ring
customer_reviews.text: The towel ring matches all the other Voss accessories I have in my remodeled bathroom. I have not installed it yet as the remodel is in progress. I love Moen and the look of the Voss brushed nickel. It will compliment the retangular theme of the bathroom. I have Moen in my kitchen and it stays nice without much work--(no spotting) this is why I am sticking with Moen.
customer_reviews.author: Augie the doggie

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: You could never go wrong with Moen, I have used their products over and over and have yet to be disappointed, Moen is my go-to when it comes to dressing up my bathrooms. Loved the quality and the form. Simple and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: I. Averbukh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for a hand towel in powder room love the shape
customer_reviews.author: Stars & Stripes

customer_reviews.title: Towel ring
customer_reviews.text: I chose it because the Moen Voss line is elegant. It has no extraneous contours, just the form required by the function. It is quite substantial. The only possible drawback is that it is not reversible.
customer_reviews.author: Gunther K. Wertheim

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cannot hang a roll of Toliet paper on this holder
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Great towel ring! We receive many compliments! Heavy duty. We use it daily in our bathroom. Good bronze color. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TMac

product_meta.title: Moen YB5186BN Voss Collection Bathroom Hand Towel Ring, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description:
Color:NickelFeaturing crisp edges and uncomplicated style, the Moen Voss Bathroom Towel Ring brings a timeless yet fashion-forward touch to any bathroom. Designed to match the Moen Voss series of trims, this contemporary towel ring for bathrooms comes with mounting hardware and a template for easy home installation. Choose from highly reflective chrome, warm brushed nickel, or rich oil-rubbed bronze finishes to match your home aesthetic. This towel ring is backed by Moen's Limited Lifetime Warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Crisp edges and uncomplicated style features give the Voss(TM) collection an ageless, yet fashion-forward, presence. Each silhouette brings a confident transitional style to the bath. Its close proximity to the sink and faucet makes it an important visual element in the bath.
feature_bullets: WARM AND INVITING: Brushed Nickel finish provides a lightly brushed warm-grey metallic look
HELPING HAND: Keeps hand towels easily accessible and also displays decorative towels
COORDINATING COLLECTION: Coordinates with faucets and accessoies from the Voss Collection
BUILT TO LAST: Backed by Moen’s Limited Lifetime Warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars396 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
